name: A Light in the Dark (itch) (Moonshl)
description:
A Light in the Dark is a small creepy-enviroment game which I made just to have some fun.

I tried to image what's after the life, and what came over my mind was a light. A Light in the Dark. So i started making this project and after about 5 hours it was done.

I hope you're all going to enjoy this small project i just made up.
